Carmen Chaplin https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Carmen_Chaplin 0 Carmen Chaplin (born 1972) is a British and French actress and film director. She is the daughter of Michael Chaplin, granddaughter of Charlie Chaplin, and great-granddaughter of playwright Eugene O'Neill. Her mother is the French painter Patricia Betaudier, daughter of Trinidadian artist Patrick Betaudier.She was born 1972 in London, and grew up in France and Spain. She made her film debut in 1991 in Wim Wenders' Until the End of the World, and has since appeared in several films, such as My Favourite Season (1993), The Serpent's Kiss (1997), and All About the Benjamins (2002). She has directed one short film, Tryst in Paname, starring her sister Dolores Chaplin and Bambou Gainsbourg. Carmen_Chaplin ( born 1972 ) is a_British_and_French_actress_and_film_director . She is the_daughter of Michael_Chaplin , granddaughter of Charlie_Chaplin , and great-granddaughter of playwright_Eugene_O'Neill . Her_mother is the_French_painter_Patricia_Betaudier , daughter of Trinidadian_artist_Patrick_Betaudier.She was_born 1972 in London , and grew up in_France and Spain . She made her_film_debut in 1991 in Wim_Wenders ' Until the_End of the_World , and has_since_appeared in several_films , such_as My_Favourite_Season_(_1993_) , The_Serpent 's_Kiss ( 1997_) , and All About the_Benjamins ( 2002_) . She has_directed one_short_film , Tryst in Paname , starring her_sister_Dolores_Chaplin and Bambou_Gainsbourg .
